text: i really like you, but maybe we should spend a little less time together because i need my space but i'll call you on tuesday, and then you never call me so i call you, but you don't call me back and then when i run into you at the coffee shop you pretend like you've been having problems with your voice mail and i know that you're lying, but i pretend like i don't care even though i'm dying inside!
